# Module: tf.contrib.solvers



Defined in [`tensorflow/contrib/solvers/__init__.py`](https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.7/tensorflow/contrib/solvers/__init__.py).

Ops for representing Bayesian computation.

## This package provides classes for Bayesian computation with TensorFlow.
